title: The One About Moms
description:
With Mother's Day fast approaching, Bob and Monét sit down to talk about Moms and bring no shortage of tangents with them. Tune in to find out the truth about Monét's accent and hear Bob recount the shock he experienced growing up when she saw a school teacher outside the classroom!!
For listeners of the show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to DipseaStories.com/RIVALRY. 
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
